Title: Two Piece Prom Dress with Train

----

Sku: CK11

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: 10, 8, 4, 6

----

Colors: champagne

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CK11-champagne-two-piece-prom-dress-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: Two piece featuring a halter top. The front of the top is beaded with a swirling design and the back of the bodice is open with sequined crossing straps. The floor length skirt trails the floor with a sweeping train and is embellished with beading and sequins on the  trim of the midriff.
